reviews.text: Just had a phone call from my girlfriend who was Upset about the way she was treated, she asked for a ramp so she could get on the train with the push chair the man  aggressively  Said no for health and safety reason. Then she asked can you please help me get my pram on the train, he replied no if you get manage your luggage you can’t board the train, so the man watched her unload my 10 month old baby and struggle with the pram.. what kind of poor customer service is this ?
Very helpful staff putting my luggage on the train......

Arrived at the station only to find my wallet with all my money, cards and return train tickets was missing. The male ticket clerk couldn't have been more helpful.   Let me use his phone to let my husband know and then printed me a complimentary return ticket to my destination.   I have already spoken to customer services and thanked them for this kind gesture.

My husband had a fall on the station and the staff were very kind and helpful, my husband received first aid and they even gave us a cup of tea. They came along to check he was ok before we boarded our train and also had a phone call a few days later to check he was ok. A big thank you to the staff who helped,  it was very much appreciated.

ticket stuff are so rude! I Was just trying to buy a ticket so I could leave and had 5 members of stuff standing there just looking at me for 10mins! Made me fill very uncomfortable then when I ask someone if they could actually serve me I get told I’m rude and that There not going to let me leave the train station! One man starting saying something about my mum not sure what he was saying as he was mumbling but my mum is sadly dead I told him this and they all started laughing which made me very sad! i also missed my coach due to this so I didn’t get home till 11oclock at night! I’m not the only person they was rude too either
